description:
With Yamamoto`s help, Yuriko is starting to unravel the mystery behind the attacks on the frontier while the UPSF high command convenes to discuss its plans for allocation of the new high-speed battlecruisers. Despite the growing threat from the UPSF, the Raalgon Empire remains embroiled in a power struggle instigated by Prime Minister Wang and his many followers.
Source: crunchyroll
